name: wikidocs-system
description: Modern Wiki/Documentation System with React Frontend and NestJS Backend

scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd app/frontend && pnpm install && cd ../backend && pnpm install
scripts.db:setup: cd app/backend && pnpm prisma generate && pnpm prisma db push && pnpm prisma db seed
scripts.network: echo "Frontend: http://$(hostname -I | awk '{print $1}'):5173" && echo "Backend: http://$(hostname -I | awk '{print $1}'):3001"
